auth.title: Welcome back
auth.subtitle: Sign in with a magic link or your favourite identity provider.

fields.remember_hint: Keeps your session active for 30 days.

magic.success: Magic link sent! Check your inbox.
magic.sent: We sent a secure link to {email}.

totp.title: Verify with 2FA
totp.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

auth.policy: By continuing you agree to the Terms and Privacy of Ava.ai.

marketing.taglineFooter: The AI receptionist that captures every opportunity 24/7.

fallback.title: Your AI receptionist is always available
fallback.subtitle: Design, launch, and operate a human-level voice assistant that greets callers, qualifies leads, and schedules appointments in minutes.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for has moved or no longer exists.

onboarding.title: Let's configure your Ava
onboarding.subtitle: Guided onboarding with auto-save. You can invite the team once done.
onboarding.autosave: Auto-saving every 10 seconds. Use ⌘K to jump to sections.
onboarding.pageSubtitle: Complete the steps to launch Ava. You can revisit them anytime from Ava Studio.

sidebarTip.title: Pro tip
sidebarTip.body: Press ⌘K to open the command palette and move faster.

dashboardPage.title: Dashboard
dashboardPage.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your Ava assistants.

activity.title: Activity overview
activity.subtitle: Monitor your calls and performance in real-time

alerts.notConfigured: Vapi configuration missing. Add a valid VAPI API key to sync assistants.
alerts.fetchFailed: We couldn't load your assistants right now.
alerts.parseFailed: Unexpected response from the Vapi assistants service.
alerts.empty: No assistants have been synchronised yet.

hero.title: Design your Ava receptionists
hero.subtitle: {count, plural, =0 {Start by creating your first voice assistant.} one {{countFormatted} assistant ready to greet your callers.} other {{countFormatted} assistants ready to greet your callers.}}

metrics.total: {count, plural, =0 {No assistants yet} one {{countFormatted} assistant configured} other {{countFormatted} assistants configured}}

library.title: Assistants library
library.subtitle: Switch between personas and focus one to edit in the designer.
library.count: {count, plural, =0 {No assistants} one {{countFormatted} assistant} other {{countFormatted} assistants}}

empty.title: You haven’t created any assistants yet
empty.subtitle: Spin up as many personas as you need. Each assistant can have its own tone, script, and voice.

warnings.notConfigured: Connect your Vapi account to surface existing assistants.
warnings.fetchFailed: We couldn’t reach the assistants service. Try again in a moment.
warnings.parseFailed: The assistants service returned an unexpected format.
warnings.empty: No assistants were returned by Vapi yet.

designer.title: Assistant designer
designer.subtitle: Tune persona, scripting, voice, routing, and integrations for the focused assistant.
designer.helper: Select an assistant on the left to link it, then save to push updates to Vapi and your callers instantly.

callsPage.title: Calls
callsPage.subtitle: {count} calls analysed • New calls stream in real time
callsPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by phone, transcript, or ID...

contactsPage.title: Contacts
contactsPage.subtitle: {contacts} contacts • {calls} total calls
contactsPage.searchPlaceholder: Search contacts by name or phone...

timeline.title: Call history
timeline.subtitle: {count, plural, one {# call logged} other {# calls logged}}
timeline.empty: No calls recorded for this contact yet.
timeline.noTranscript: No transcript available for this call.

notFound.title: We can't find this contact yet
notFound.subtitle: Record a call or refresh to synchronise the latest activity.

contactsPage.emptyDescription: Your contacts will appear here once you start receiving calls.

header.title: Settings
header.subtitle: Manage your personal details and configure your Ava studio.

movedNotice.title: Looking for studio settings?
movedNotice.subtitle: Assistant creation and persona tuning now live on the Assistants page.

profile.title: User profile
profile.description: Your details appear in notifications and customer communications.

messages.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.

errors.nameMin: Name must contain at least 2 characters

studio.title: Studio settings
studio.description: Define your organisation identity and Ava personality.
studio.error: We couldn't load the configuration. Please try again.
studio.smtpDescription: Configure the sender for automated reports and notifications.

analyticsPage.title: Detailed analytics
analyticsPage.subtitle: Track call volume, sentiment, and key topics in real time to optimise Ava.
